mapper.sql: id, vender, equipment_number, equipment_name, standard_model, equipment_type, equipment_count, rights_unit, belong_warehouse, project_address, project_date, init_date, demand_sponsors, procurement_causes, `state`, audit_advice,insert_person, insert_person_depart_id, update_person, update_person_depart_id, insert_date, update_date,isBuy
mapper.select:
select
from am_equipment_require
and equipment_name like concat('%', #{equipmentName}, '%')
and equipment_number like concat('%', #{equipmentNumber}, '%')
and vender like concat('%', #{vender}, '%')
and equipment_type like concat('%', #{equipmentType}, '%')
and rights_unit like concat('%', #{rightsUnit}, '%')
and belong_warehouse like concat('%', #{belongWarehouse}, '%')
and project_address like concat('%', #{projectAddress}, '%')
and date_format(project_date,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{projectDate},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(init_date,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{initDate},'%y%m%d')
